detectors.description:
Reentrancy in BlackJack.checkGameResult(BlackJack.Game,bool) (shared/bad_randomness/blackjack.sol#159-247):
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send((game.bet * 5) / 2) (shared/bad_randomness/blackjack.sol#183)
	- ! msg.sender.send(game.bet * 2) (shared/bad_randomness/blackjack.sol#186)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- games[msg.sender].state = GameState.Player (shared/bad_randomness/blackjack.sol#188)
